sentences.en: A brilliant shaft of sunlight burst through the doorway.
sentences.cn: 一束耀眼的阳光从门口照射进来。

sentences.en: Amy stood quietly in the doorway watching him.
sentences.cn: 埃米一言不发地站在门口看着他。

sentences.en: An older woman, pink-cheeked and tweedy, appeared in the doorway.
sentences.cn: 一位面颊绯红、一副乡下贵族打扮的老妇人出现在门口。

sentences.en: Children came to peep at him round the doorway.
sentences.cn: 孩子们围在门口偷看他。

sentences.en: Hannah looked up to see David and another man standing in the doorway.
sentences.cn: 汉纳抬起头，看到戴维和另一个男人站在门口。

sentences.en: He passed through the doorway into Ward B.
He stood in the doorway, listening to her quiet, regular breathing.
sentences.cn: 他站在走道里，听着她那沉静而规律的呼吸声。

sentences.en: He walked towards the doorway, careful to keep his distance.
sentences.cn: 他走向门口，小心翼翼地保持着距离。

sentences.en: Here and there a face peeped out from the shop doorway.
sentences.cn: 商店门口从不同方向露出一张脸。

sentences.en: Liddie's doorway yawned blackly open at the end of the hall.
sentences.cn: 走廊尽头利迪的门黑洞洞地敞开着。

sentences.en: Raymond's head poked through the doorway.
sentences.cn: 雷蒙德的头从门口探了出来。

sentences.en: She stood in the doorway for a moment before going in.
sentences.cn: 她在门口站了一会儿才进去。

sentences.en: The man was standing in his doorway watching him.
sentences.cn: 那个男人站在门口盯着他看。

sentences.en: They put a table athwart the doorway.
sentences.cn: 他们把桌子横放在门口。

sentences.en: Two pint-sized kids emerged from a doorway.
sentences.cn: 两个身型矮小的孩子从门口出现了。

sentences.en: We were escorted through a low doorway.
sentences.cn: 我们在人陪同下穿过一条低矮的门道。

trans.tran_en: the space where a door opens into a room or building
